Micro Capacitor

  1. Does Micro Capacitor work on Thrust's ability? Probable not but I want to make sure.
    You are correct. It does not!
  2. Would Micro Capacitor work for Thrust even though Thrust doesnâ€™t have the tap symbol on his card?
    No, the tap symbol must be present on a card for Micro Capacitor to apply to it.
